definition: variant of 帳篷|帐篷[zhang4 peng5]

sentences.english: At that side also of the tabernacle, that looketh toward the north, he made twenty boards.
sentences.chinese: 爲帳棚的另一面，即北邊，也做了二十塊木板。

sentences.english: Woe to me that I dwell in Meshech, that I live among the tents of Kedar!
sentences.chinese: 我寄居在米設，住在基達帳棚之中，有禍了。

sentences.english: They grumbled in their tents and did not obey the Lord .
sentences.chinese: 在自己帳棚內發怨言，不聽耶和華的聲音。

sentences.english: He'll need a tent and a flashlight.
sentences.chinese: 他需要一頂帳棚和一個手電筒。

sentences.english: I saw the tents of Cushan in affliction: and the curtains of the land of Midian did tremble.
sentences.chinese: 我見古珊的帳棚遭難，米甸的幔子戰兢。

sentences.english: He warned the assembly, "Move back from the tents of these wicked men!"
sentences.chinese: 於是衆人離開可拉，大坍，亞比蘭帳棚的四圍。

sentences.english: And Isaac departed thence， and pitched his tent in the valley of Gerar， and dwelt there.
sentences.chinese: 以撒就離開那裏，在基拉耳谷支搭帳棚，住在那裏。

sentences.english: Michael just bought a new tent and sleeping bags for the family camping trip.
sentences.chinese: 麥可剛爲全家的露營之旅，買了新帳棚和睡袋。

sentences.english: He made also bars of setim wood, five to hold together the boards of one side of the tabernacle.
sentences.chinese: 又用皂莢木做了橫木爲帳棚這一面木板做了五根。

sentences.english: They are hidden in the ground inside my tent, with the silver underneath.
sentences.chinese: 現今藏在我帳棚內的地裏，銀子在衣服底下。

sentences.english: And two others at each corner of the tabernacle behind.
sentences.chinese: 在帳棚的後面的兩角上，做了兩塊木板。

sentences.english: In the second side also the tabernacle that looketh to the north, there shall be twenty boards.
sentences.chinese: 爲帳棚的另一面，即北邊，也應做二十塊木板。

sentences.english: Israel moved on again and pitched his tent beyond Migdal Eder.
sentences.chinese: 以色列起行前往，在以得臺那邊支搭帳棚。

sentences.english: If the men of my tabernacle said not, Oh that we had of his flesh! we cannot be satisfied.
sentences.chinese: 若我帳棚的人未嘗說，誰不以主人的食物喫飽呢。

sentences.english: But the story of gushing milk from the cows in the camp is very interesting.
sentences.chinese: 但是，母牛在帳棚分泌牛奶的故事很有趣。

sentences.english: So Isaac moved away from there and encamped in the Valley of Gerar and settled there.
sentences.chinese: 以撒就離開那裏，在基拉耳谷支搭帳棚，住在那裏。

definition: El Niño (meteorology)/Holy Infant (cf biblical nativity story)
drinking party/to go on a binge/to paint the town red
seize every minute and second (idiom); not a minute to lose/every moment counts
